config.gamma_shifter.silent_mode.tooltip: Silent Mode hides all HUD elements of the mod
config.gamma_shifter.change_per_input.to: The percent change in the brightness when the increase/decrease key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.always_start_enable: Whether the mod always starts enabled or not
config.gamma_shifter.snap.tooltip: Snaps the brightness to the nearest multiple of the change per input value
config.gamma_shifter.always_save_custom_: Save the customized brightness to options.txt regardless of whether the mod is toggled on/off
config.gamma_shifter.preset_one.tooltip: The brightness value to set when the Preset 1 key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.preset_two.tooltip: The brightness value to set when the Preset 2 key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.show_current_gamma_: If enabled, the current brightness is displayed in the top left corner at all times
config.gamma_shifter.persistent_overlay_: The location that the persistent brightness display is shown
config.gamma_shifter.textColour.tooltip: The colour used for text in HUD elements
config.gamma_shifter.show_message_on_gam: Enables/disables a message above the hotbar when the increase/decrease brightness key is pressed
